title: A statistical error in Wood & Cook's (1979) ‘Attentional deficit in the siblings of schizophrenics’
abstract: SYNOPSIS Re-analysis is made of the data from a recent study purporting toshow an attentional deficit in the siblings of schizophrenics when compared with a matched control group. The re-analysis fails to support the previously reported levels of statistical reliability and may question the inferences to be drawn from the study.
